p: Another way that bioinformatics has contributed to the field of infectious diseases, was the development of a new era of bioactive natural products research, through linking many bioactive natural products to their associated biosynthetic gene clusters and corresponding enzymes. Although this approach has proven to be effective in identifying bioactive molecules and the BGCs that are associated to them, they are still in their infancy and represent a new shift in sustainable drug discovery, especially for plants and animals.
